title: I Love Cooking!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Sweet potatoes, chestnuts, pumpkins, apples~♪ Autumn is so full of delicious things~ Hm hmm♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, what a happy tune. Sounds like you’re in a good mood, Kanata-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course Kanata is~. We’re going to cook a dish fu~ll of the flavors of Autumn, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>What shall we make? Maybe some cupcakes, pound cakes, or cookies. Scones and puddings would also be nice....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s not sweets, but Kanata wants to try making a kind of soup. There’s this French dish called Chestnut Potage~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Chestnut Potage? I’ve never heard of that before.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata saw it on TV. Apparently, it’s delicious even when it’s cold.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Waaah, I want to try making it. Why don’t we try making soup with the pumpkins and potatoes too? Something like 3 different kinds of potages.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Good idea~! We’ll make all three and ask everyone which they like most~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Alright! Let’s give it our all in making them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
